citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 16:45 on
27-FEB-18.
Arrived at facility at approx. 16:45. No responsible adult was present. Called listed phone number at 17:30 and left
message. Left facility at approx. 18:00. Left messages on voice mail for following 2 days with no return calls.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 16:45 on
27-FEB-18.
Arrived at facility at approx. 16:45.  No responsible adult was present.  Called listed phone number at 17:30 and left
message.  Left facility at approx. 18:00. Left messages on voice mail for following 2 days with no return calls.
